name: Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Repplier Coal Company

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Repplier Coal Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the able and comprehensive opinion of President Judge Hargest.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry (x. Stambaugh, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him James H. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
Chas. W. Hull, with him Geo. Boss Hull, of Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Repplier Coal Company.
Argued November 29, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
Harry (x. Stambaugh, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him James H. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
Chas. W. Hull, with him Geo. Boss Hull, of Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellee.
January 3, 1944:
